page.title: 13A DAY IN THE LIFE OF A CHILD
page.content: We looked closely at the life style of one child living within our area.A breakdown of a week in her life gives us this sort of picture. She gets up at rougly7:30a.m on schooldays washes,has breakfast and helps with a number of household chores before leaving for school at 8:30a.m.She spends from 9a.m. to 3:30 p.m.in school where she has a cooked lunch.he often takes part in a number of club activities after school.She returns home between 4:30p.m.and 4:45 and has her tea.The time up to bedtime at 9p.m.is available for leisure.Here she follows her hobbies of reading, computer studying and watching T.V. In the summer she spends some time out with friends.At weekends she gets up later and goes to bed later on a Sat but earlier on Sunday.She also has a number of chores to do on a Sunday.
